𒄬 ḪAL half

𒄮 sur₃ 𒋩 surᵐᵃ semi #šinnû #mišlu meso <> middle 𓇷 𓇸 𔓷 ha "half" ☼ hel 𓇺 hill

𒄮 sur sul shul hal half ?

𔓷 ha half •hel 🌕🌞☼
ⵀ h b ھ ب h b yah = Tuareg yab Halb ⴱ ה B ≈ 𓊪 𓎼 𓎸 pug (bowl, Becher) 𓊪 𓎼 𓇷 𓂡 part open 𓇷 halb half-moon 𓊪 𓊃 𓂧 𓈖 𓇷 | the new moon and its festival | Fasten Fest passover 𓇸 ¼ quarter-moon?

𓌽 hordeum 𓇠 ⲥⲟⲩⲟ ?

𒄮 sur <> זעורא zūrā zūro zero 𓂋 󳝧 󳚤 󳚧 ½ 𒊒 "small"

𓇸 si-in month @ Elamite
